remarks: Associative law for scalar product.  ( ~ ax-hvmulass analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
lmodvsass.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvsass.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvsass.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvsass.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmodvsass.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` F ) $.
lmodvsass $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( Q e. K /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( Q .X. R ) .x. X ) = ( Q .x. ( R .x. X ) ) ) $.
